text: The women's pole vault event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 14 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lisa Ryjikh ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Zhao Yingying ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Anna Schultze ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
